entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gulf Islands (Southern)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h. High 8. Forecast issued 08:29 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to 11 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Rain beginning near midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature rising to 11 by morning. Forecast issued 08:29 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:29 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
